title: sometimes an error
body:
Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'alternatives').

seems to add a adjustment for this property.

thank u.
author: sword-dot

comments.body:
Your problem should be to get the default value of 0 for the alternative.
The specific code is located in `translate.js` 40 line.
```js
numberAlternative = 0
```
I may update it later, so that it can customize parameters in vercel, and at the same time, it is easier to customize the configuration when deploying locally/server.

If this problem has been solved, I will close this issues tomorrow.
Otherwise, you should bring a screenshot or detailed log information so that I can find the problem.
